EmailTemplate.name: BGA_TFE731_MSP_Survey.BGA_TFE731_MSP_Survey_Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Don't Forget to Take Honeywell's TFE Survey & Enter to Win an Apple Watch
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Valued Customer,
Don't forget what time it is. Time to enter our drawing for an Apple Watch by answering a few questions about your aircraft usage!
We're asking you to take a short survey about how you intend to operate your turbo fan engine equipped aircraft in 2020.
The survey should take about 5 minutes to complete. Your participation in the Turbo Fan Engine Survey is voluntary, and if you choose to include your personal contact information, you'll be entered in a drawing for an Apple Watch (Please read Official Rules <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/survey-drawing]]>).
Again, thank you in advance for providing your feedback! We appreciate your help with improving and evolving our products.
TAKE THE SURVEY <[[https://survey.sjc1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_e9bbfrSFV7WxXmt]]>
If you aren't the appropriate person to fill out this survey, please forward to the right person. Thank you.
